item.title: New England Patriots Fandom üèà
item.description:
New England Patriots Fandom üèà

My first football memory was rooting for the 1985 patriots as they got pummeled in the super bowl-

In elementary we were the Ronald Reagan Patriots

In rural New Mexico, the Drew Bledsoe era patriots had superior coverage to any other team as the world’s first pro sports website and world’s original podcast
